700310f.text:
West 195th Street, north side, between Reservoir Ave. and Jerome Ave., showing Public School No. 86. At the time of this photograph the school was located on the east side of Reservoir Ave., at the head of Strong Street from which it was removed to its present (1937) location. On the school's original aite was constructed Walton High School. A modern 5-story elementary school, bearing the same number, was constructed at the N.E. corner of Reservoir Ave. and West 195th Street. The old school house now constitutes an annex to the main building.
May 8, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
